#### Important Notice: Tender Description

Canada is seeking the provision and installation of four (4) cantilever racking sets at the HMC Dockyards in Nova Scotia. Delivery is requested by June 28, 2024. Please note that this solicitation is now expired. Successful bidder(s) will be notified separately.

By Request for Express of Interest Friday, April 28, 2023 the honorarium are required to:
-  Laurier
